short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that improves the UI of paulgraham.com website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Modern-Reads: Paul Graham UI Enhancer” is an extension designed to enhance your essay reading experience on PaulGraham.com. Drawing inspiration from the clean and intuitive design of Medium.com, this extension revamps the user interface for a more engaging and visually appealing layout.

One of its key features is the in-place reading of footnotes. This eliminates the need to navigate away from the main article, ensuring a seamless reading flow. Additionally, it provides improved navigation between footnotes and the main content, making it easier to reference and cross-check information.

Experience a modern and intuitive reading journey while reading Paul Graham's essays with “Modern-Reads”.
